content: असुर्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [असुराय हिता गवा° यत्] {@--1@} Incorporeal, spiritual, divine. {@--2@} Demoniacal, belonging to the Asuras or sprung from them (असुरस्य स्वं <ls>P. IV. 4. 123</ls>). --र्यं {@--1@} The water of the clouds. {@--2@} Spirituality, divine nature. {@--3@} The collective body of spiritual beings.
